file_content.text: Hope that evac gets here soon. This thing is giving me the willies.
You--you made it back. So the Gormak.... And their pets...?
That's... wow. I mean, I saw what those beasts... they would've made mincemeat out of the Voss.
And without trainers, the Gormak won't produce any more of those things for a while.
Those monsters were a serious threat. It's a good thing you found them.
Your info helped.
I think it's more accurate to say they found us... but thanks.
Be safe.
I'll do my best.
Goodbye.
Oh, and thank you for getting those service tags. It means a lot.
I managed to get my comm working long enough to call for a pickup. Should be here shortly. Take care.
Please, you've got to stop the Gormak before they unleash those monsters on the Voss.
A Jedi! Am I glad to see you.
Sir! Am I glad to see you.
Boy, am I glad to see you.
Private Ozer, Republic infantry. I--my team was out on assignment with a local unit of Voss commandos. Joint op.
This... thing attacked us. Killed everyone before it took a nosedive off the cliff. I'd heard the Gormak had some crazy pets, but this....
You're the only survivor?
Everyone else is dead?
Yeah. The others... there isn't much left.
A dangerous predator. You're lucky to be in one piece.
At least you're still alive.
If that cliff side hadn't given way, I... yeah.
This your first assignment, Private?
You new here?
Uh, yes, sir. Almost wound up being my last.
You mean to tell me you drove this big monster off all by yourself?
No way you killed it.
Err, not exactly. Cliff side gave way, took the creature with it. Splat.
You're wounded.
I--I think my arm's broken, maybe a few cuts. Could've been worse, though.
What were you and the Voss doing out here?
Tell me about your mission.
We were trying to recover some stolen maps of the surrounding Voss outposts. Search led us to a nearby cave.
Our scouts found the Gormak breeding a whole mess of these things inside. Gearing up for an all-out assault on the Voss.
You've got to warn the Voss about this.
You need to tell someone.
Can't. Comm's busted. Besides, no way the Voss can prepare for an attack like this.
And that's when the creature attacked?
What happened then?
That's right. Ripped right through us.
How much damage are these things capable of?
Give me a worst-case scenario.
Plenty. Could chomp a man in half even without all the tech enhancements the Gormak added.
Just one of those monsters tore an entire squad to pieces without breaking a sweat. If the Gormak unleash a whole army of them....
The Voss are counting on us, Master Jedi. We've got to destroy the Gormak and their pets. I'd help, but this arm....
We need to take them out, sir--the beasts and their Gormak trainers. I wouldn't ask, but you are in Havoc Squad, so....
Someone's got to put them down, Captain, the Gormak and their monsters both. I know this isn't your fight, but this is beyond me.
We've got to wipe them out--the beasts and their Gormak trainers. I'd help, but these wounds....
You stay here and rest. I'll deal with the Gormak.
Leave it to me.
Taking on an army? Sure.
I--thank you. I'd hate to see another massacre.
One more thing. The others, what's left of them... they're still up top where the monster attacked us.
If you can retrieve their service tags, I'll pass them along to their families. Not a proper burial, but it's something.
Too dangerous. [Refuse quest]
Can't blame you. Still, I don't want to be here when that horde goes on the march.
Don't worry about this thing. It's dead... I think.
